description: This API is used to store and read data on EYWA hosted database. Usually this includes sync, stack, slice, search, get, delete, purge operations on modeled and deployed Datasets.
name: EYWA GraphQL

scopes.name: dataset:deploy
scopes.description: Allows user to deploy dataset models

scopes.name: dataset:delete
scopes.description: Allows user to delete dataset, and all tables that are specific only to that dataset

scopes.name: dataset:subscription
scopes.description: User can subscribe to dataset changes by using GraphQL "refreshedGlobalDataset" subscription endpoint

scopes.name: robotics.location:add
scopes.description: Allows user to add robotics location

scopes.name: robotics.git:remove
scopes.description: Allows user to remove GIT repository

scopes.name: robotics.location:remove
scopes.description: Allows user to remove robotics location

scopes.name: robotics.git:add
scopes.description: Allows user to add new git repository

scopes.name: robotics.queue:remove
scopes.description: Allows user to remove tasks from robot queue

scopes.name: dataset:save
scopes.description: Allows user to save new dataset version

scopes.name: dataset:load
scopes.description: Allows user to view saved datasets

scopes.name: dataset:graphiql
scopes.description: Allows user to introspect GraphQL schema
